translations.translation: With Us there are shackles and a Blazing Fire
Verily We shall have fetters with Us, and a roaring furnace,
We have heavy fetters and a blazing Fire in store for them;
We have prepared for them fetters, flaming fire,
Indeed We have heavy fetters and a blazing fire.
Verily, with Us are Ankal, and Jahim.
Surely with Us are heavy fetters and a flaming fire,
for with Us there are fetters, and a furnace,
Lo! with Us are heavy fetters and a raging fire,
We have in store for them heavy fetters and a blazing Fire,
Verily with us are heavy fetters and Scorch.
Indeed with Us are heavy fetters and a fierce fire,
With Us are Fetters (to bind them), and a Fire (to burn them),
Verily, with Us are fetters (to bind them), and a raging Fire.
We have fetters (for them) and a blazing fire,
With Us are shackles, and a Fierce Fire.
Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
[73:12] [For] indeed with Us are heavy fetters (ankāl is the plural of nikl), heavy shackles, and a hell-fire, a scorching Fire,

(Lo! with Us) for them in the Hereafter (are heavy fetters) with which their hands will be tied to their necks and chains will also be put around their necks (and a raging fire) which they will enter,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالاً } معناه قيودٌ واحدُها نِكالٌ
 ونِكْلٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ولا تيأس من مكرنا إياهم { إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ } معداً لهم أنواعاً من العذاب { أَنكَالاً } أثقالاً؛ لتثاقلهم وعدم تحملهم وتصبرهم بمتاعب التكاليف الإلهية، ومشاق الطاعات والعبادات المأمورة لهم من قِبَله سبحانه { وَجَحِيماً } [المزمل: 12] عظيماً بدل ما يتلذذون بنيران الشهوات، ويظلمون الناس بأنواع الغضب والطغيان

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { إنَّ لَدَيْنا } للكافرين يوم القيامة، { أنكالاً } قيوداً ثِقالاً، جمع نِكْل، { وجَحيماً } ناراً محرقة { وطعاماً ذا غُصَّةٍ } الذي ينشب في الحلوق فلا يُساغ، يعني: الضريع والزقوم
